nodes.name: Knowledge obsolescence in AI alignment research teams
aliases: outdated knowledge risk for alignment work
nodes.description: AI-alignment researchers may miss critical advances in machine-learning, reducing the quality and timeliness of their work.
nodes.node_rationale: Opening paragraph highlights difficulty for any group to stay updated on latest ML developments.

nodes.name: Rapid expansion of machine-learning literature
nodes.description: The quantity and diversity of new ML results and applications is growing quickly, overwhelming individual researchers’ capacity to track them.
nodes.node_rationale: Job ad states that ML is a fast-moving and diverse field, making it challenging to stay updated.

nodes.name: Comprehensive monitoring mitigates knowledge gaps in research teams
nodes.description: If an expert systematically reviews all significant ML developments, the research team can maintain current knowledge despite rapid field growth.
nodes.node_rationale: Implied by advertisement: reading every interesting paper keeps team abreast of noteworthy developments.

nodes.name: Dedicated literature surveillance role at research institute
aliases: specialist position for tracking ML papers
nodes.description: Creating a specific staff position whose primary responsibility is to monitor and communicate developments converts the theoretical benefit of surveillance into an organisational plan.
nodes.node_rationale: ‘About the Role’ and ‘Ideal Candidate’ sections outline the job as a solution.

nodes.name: Establish full-time ML Living Library position at MIRI
nodes.description: MIRI plans to hire a full-time, multi-year employee who reads all significant ML papers, tracks trends, and answers staff questions.
nodes.node_rationale: Detailed duties and employment conditions described in job ad constitute the concrete mechanism.

nodes.name: Expected improved researcher support through literature updates
aliases: anticipated benefit of living library hire
nodes.description: MIRI expects that regularly communicated ML insights will aid engineers’ debugging, inform strategic decisions, and surface unnoticed advances.
nodes.node_rationale: Examples of tasks (helping debug, tracking trends) provide prospective evidence for effectiveness.

nodes.name: Hire ML Living Library for multi-year tenure at MIRI
nodes.description: Recruit and employ a full-time individual with broad and deep ML expertise to continuously ingest, curate, and relay relevant ML research to the AI-alignment team.
nodes.intervention_lifecycle_rationale: Hiring is an organisational action not tied to model lifecycle phases (closest ref: 'Apply' section).
nodes.intervention_maturity_rationale: The position is newly proposed; no prior evidence of systematic effectiveness (closest ref: 'About the Role').
nodes.node_rationale: Final concrete action proposed by the document to address identified risk.
